* Biomass only smiles as Perndabot clenches his teeth, thinking just how 
emotionally unstable was this being and were all of the male gender like 
him?
Nue'e was almts trying to yank him away from the tip of Perndabot's gun by 
this time, pulling on the tenticles which made up his cape.
How stupid did this man think he was, challenging a race they knew nothing 
about. Did he think it was smart to test their defences (weapons)?!
She nearly shreiks as she hears the click of the launchers trigger, feeling 
Biomass stumble back a few steps and nearly stepping on her in the process.
Biomass recovers his own balence and looks down at his chest-plate, a large, 
gaping  uneven hol where the missiles had impacted with him. Mech-fluid 
oozzing from the top of the hole and pouring down his stomach.
It was fairly impressive damage, but when he turned his head towards 
Perndabot there was only a smile there, laugher ripping from his throat.*

" You're more feminin then they are!" he gestures to Nue'e who was visably 
shaking and to Swift.
Biomass takes another step back and moves his cape to slide ofer her 
shoulder and cover half his chest and the damage.*

" To hide behind your weapon like the pansy that you are!"
